item.description:
This event is for A-level players and up. This is for strong experienced doubles players only. It'll probably be men's height, but if we get two women, we'll go co-ed reverse.

 

Click here to sign up.


In the email above (unless I already know you well) please provide the following information:

Name 
Gender
Your doubles experience; give detail to convince me you are A-level or AA-level.

If you want to bring a guest, provide similar info for them. Preference is given to higher level players. Note that sending an email does not guarantee a spot to play; spots are only guaranteed if you receive a positive confirmation email. If my response to your message seems slow, then you haven't provided enough to convince me you're at least A-level.

There will be at least one separate net for intermediate and beginning players.
item.how_to_find_us: Between 2nd and 3rd parking lots. To bike or walk there, once you cross over the Charles River, turn right and stay on the sidewalk between Soldiers Field Road and the Charles. Go all the way to Eliot Bridge and through its underpass.
item.name: Advanced Doubles At The River
